snippet: Knicks Coach Mike Woodson and General Manager Glen Grunwald defended their off-season moves, including not keeping Jeremy Lin, at a team media event Monday.
abstract: New York knicks general manager Glen Grunwald and coach Mike Woodson defend their decision to let go of point guard Jeremy Lin and fill the roster with older players.
lead_paragraph: Knicks Coach Mike Woodson and General Manager Glen Grunwald defended their off-season moves, including not keeping Jeremy Lin, at a team media event Monday.

headline.seo: Knicks’ Executives Project Confidence Into Void Left by Lin’s Departure
headline.main: Knicks’ Executives Project Confidence in Off-Season Moves
headline.print_headline: Knicks’ Executives Project Confidence Into Void Left by Lin’s Departure
